synthesis_conditions.note: The synthesis method for this compound is reported elsewhere and not directly provided in the text.

materials.name: CO2 Inclusion Phases of Transformable 1D Coordination Polymer Host [Rh2(O2CPh)4(pyz)]n

phase_transition.description: On cooling samples in a CO2 atmosphere, the crystal underwent a phase transition to a new structure adopting the triclinic space group P1¯, generating one-dimensional (1D) channels.

equipment.type: Rigaku RAXIS RAPID imaging plate diffractometer
equipment.details: with a nitrogen-flow temperature controller and MoKa radiation (l = 0.71073 4) over a temperature range of 20 to -180 8C

for simultaneous powder X-ray diffraction (XRD) and differential scanning calorimetry (DSC) measurements with a temperature scan rate of 3 8C min-1 and a 2-q scan rate of 15 8 min-1 over the range 5 to 358 with CuKa radiation (l = 1.54184 ,)
for independent DSC measurements at a scanning rate of 5 8C min-1

conditions.method: sealing a glass capillary containing the sample and CO2 gas at ambient pressure
scooping on a cryoloop through silicone oil

synthesis_conditions.absorption_corrections: Empirical absorption corrections were applied using the ABSCOR program.
synthesis_conditions.structure_solution: The structures were solved by the Patterson method (DIRDIF94 PATTY) and refined by full-matrix least-squares on F2 (SHELXL97).
synthesis_conditions.atom_refinement: Non-hydrogen atoms were refined anisotropically, while hydrogen atoms were fixed at calculated positions and refined using a riding model.
